sys_ux_client_script.name: Add worker from worker search

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_72d15656471c3d102dabcd9bd36d4336
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Assignments">d86858672f101110da77c886f699b6d4</macroponent><name>Add worker from worker search</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
	if (!api.state.worker_search_input) {
		return;
	}
    var shiftWorkersOnModal = api.state.msp_modal_data.shiftWorkers;
	console.log('searching for: ');
	console.log(api.state.worker_search_input);
	console.log(shiftWorkersOnModal);
	var workerSearchedOnModal = shiftWorkersOnModal.find(wkr => {
		return wkr.label.toLowerCase() == api.state.worker_search_input.toLowerCase();
	});
	var workerSearched = api.data.look_up_workers.results.find(wkr => {
		return wkr._row_data.displayValue.toLowerCase() == api.state.worker_search_input.toLowerCase(); //Todo: Use worker id
	});

	if (workerSearchedOnModal) {
		// If find worker in modal list, make active and move out of unassigned column
		workerSearchedOnModal.active = true;
		workerSearchedOnModal.unassigned = false;
	} else if (workerSearched) {
		// If find worker in complete worker list, add record
		shiftWorkersOnModal.push({
			id: workerSearched._row_data.uniqueValue,
			label: workerSearched._row_data.displayValue,
			adult: workerSearched.adult.value,
			active: true,
			unassigned: false
		});
	} else {
		// If can't find worker input, add artificial record
		shiftWorkersOnModal.push({
			id: 'new-worker',
			label: api.state.worker_search_input,
			adult: !api.state.kid_status_input,
			active: true,
			unassigned: false
		});
	}
	api.setState('msp_modal_data', JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(api.state.msp_modal_data))); //since object should be small, use a "deep copy" to trigger a "change in client state"
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-30 04:55:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>72d15656471c3d102dabcd9bd36d4336</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add worker from worker search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Eyva" source="x_802331_eyva">04928fc32fd41110da77c886f699b615</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Eyva">04928fc32fd41110da77c886f699b615</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_72d15656471c3d102dabcd9bd36d4336</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-31 06:17:33</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
